nodes.text: Longspur STAPs were a make of one-man hoverbike available during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Produced by Longspur and Alloi, the vehicles were silver in color, forming a T-shape with a small engine on each side as well as an extension for the pilot to stand on. The craft did not include any built in weaponry.

Longspur STAPs first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. The vehicle was given along with several other items to any players who brought the Digital edition of the game.
